wikipedia_page.main: William Mercer (born 22 May 1969 in Liverpool, England) is an English retired footballer who played as a goalkeeper. Mercer is currently goalkeeping coach at Burnley.

response: * Billy Mercer (footballer, born 1892) (1892–1956), former Hull City, Huddersfield Town and Blackpool goalkeeper
* Billy Mercer (footballer, born 1896) (1896–1975), former Preston North End, Blackpool, Lancaster Town and Boston Town player
* Billy Mercer (footballer, born 1969), former Rotherham United and Chesterfield player, now goalkeeping coach at Burnley FC
* Billy Mercer (musician), bassist for Strays Don't Sleep
